testimonials.text: Hulya is extremely responsive and very knowledgeable. She did a great job and put in extra effort to make sure the project was done to my high expectations. I will definitely ask her to work on future projects.

Working with Hulya was fantastic! She took the time to know the project needs, find out the details, and because of this, she was very precise with her delivery time. She needed no revisions because it was done right the first time! I highly recommend her and have already asked her for another order. Her code is great and she matched the visual spec exactly. I look forward to involving her with bigger projects in the future.
